amendatorysection.catchline: State of Nebraska; lease agreement with Grand Island; purpose.
amendatorysection.para: The State of Nebraska on behalf of the Nebraska Commission on Law Enforcement and Criminal Justice shall enter into a lease agreement with the city of Grand Island pursuant to Chapter 72, article 14, providing for the supplying by the city of Grand Island to the State of Nebraska of a Nebraska Law Enforcement Training Center and other services incidental thereto.
